Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44944495
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1954
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3499
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44954496
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep807808
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1956
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) Ep364
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various “human experiments” and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughter’s diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Zu:WarriorsFrom Magic Mountain
programme.desc: A classic fantasy action movie about the epic battles between celestial swordsmen and the Evil Force. Set on the mythical Zu mountain range, a mysterious land where ordinary men dare not venture, the legend has it that skilful swordsmen protect civilians by fending off evil. Featuring Sammo Hung, Yuen Biao and Adam Cheng and directed by Tsui Hark.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: Following the outbreak of a virus that wipes out the majority of the human population, a young woman documents her family's new life in quarantine and tries to protect her infected sister.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy
programme.desc: To teach his irresponsible daughter Jennifer some respect, her billionaire father pretends to disown her. He then hires Mario to pretend to be her driver and protect her. Just as the two start falling for each other, Jennifer’s father becomes very ill and she must take over his business. Will Jennifer and Mario’s budding romance continue?

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: The Way Of The Dragon
programme.desc: A young Hong Kong man, Tang Lung arrives at Rome to help a friend of his family, a girl called Chen Ching-hua. She has been threatened by local gangsters who want to takeover her restaurant. Soon after Tang's arrival, the gangsters appear at the restaurant and force Chen to sign over the deed. They laugh at the Chinese style of fighting. Angry Tang challenges and defeats them in an excellent show of his fighting skills. The mastermind of the gang orders Tang's assassination. When this fails, the gang leader hires an international Karate champion form the United States in a last attempt to kill Tang. Tang meets the American in a coliseum and they fight like gladiators to the death.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her father’s restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Zombiology: Enjoy Yourself Tonight
programme.desc: Two eccentric young men deem themselves as heroes who can save the earth. While they feel frustrated in real life, a zombie from their favourite animation suddenly appears in Hong Kong, turning people into zombies and causing widespread chaos, the young men decide to take on the responsibility and fight the battle against the zombies!

programme.title: Paradox
programme.desc: Hong Kong Police officer Li travels to Thailand to search for his daughter when she disappears mysteriously. He teams up with a local detective to investigate and they chance upon a black market organ smuggling ring which could throw light on his daughter’s whereabouts...

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: After several years of marriage, Prof. Wu Te-sheng (Alex Man Chi-leung) and his wife Wan Chun (Patricia Ha Man-jik) decide to have children. Then a medical examination shows Wu is the cause of the couple's infertility, and Wu reluctantly adopts his doctor's advice to have his wife artificially inseminated in Hawaii.

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: The former SWAT captain, Dong Gu, suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boy’s dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wang’s which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a “movie time machine” and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn – can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a terrorist group plots to obtain nuclear materials under the cover of a violent coup in Northern Africa, only the Chinese Navy’s elite, Jiaolong Assault Team, have the deadly skill and precision needed to take on the situation and rescue its citizens.

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: Love triangles or quadrangles rule, as a group of young people get entangled in a web of love and emotions. Director Doe Chin, renowned for his dramas and musicals, knows just how to tug at the heartstrings.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Danger has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of ‘scaffolding kung fu”.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin’s husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian’s rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian’s granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Fresh from his smashing directorial debut comedy Let's Make Laugh, Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This colourful, complex saga is packed with conspiracies, schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres on the struggle for underworld supremacy between the Longmen and Roc clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut or obvious.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, the same martial arts teacher of his father. Although he is defeated in the competition, Wong Fei Hung’s passion in Kung Fu finally allows him to become Lu’s disciple.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - “Twelve Deadly Coins” and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang’s (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father’s deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. When the two meet, they are entangled in the underworld of boxing gambling.

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Vidhi Madhi Ulta
programme.desc: Aadhi has a nightmare where the girl he loves and his family is murdered by a gangster. However, he soon realises that everything around him is starting to take the shape of his nightmare.

programme.title: Arumugam
programme.desc: Due to his hard work, Arumugam, a helpful poor man, becomes the richest man in his town. He sets out to exact revenge on Malini, a tycoon, for bulldozing his mother's grave and humiliating his sister.

programme.title: Tripura
programme.desc: Village girl who has weird dreams and all those dreams come true.She one day dreams that she will kill her Husband.

programme.title: Kennedy Club
programme.desc: Savarimuthu, an ex-soldier, falls sick while training the women's kabaddi team of his village. Soon, a former student named Muruganandham is chosen to take his place.

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Vaishnavi and Sandeep, a couple, are engaged to be married soon. However, things spiral out of control when she get possessed by her dead lookalike, who thirsts for revenge against Sandeep.

programme.title: Madhayaanai Koottam
programme.desc: Parthiban, the son of a powerful late patriarch, accidentally kills the son of Veera Thevar, while trying to save his stepbrother. Veera then decides to avenge his son's death by murdering Parthiban.

programme.title: Malaysia To Amnesia
programme.desc: Malaysia To Amnesia revolves around two childhood friends who plan to get married. However, they face complications as they are unable to cope with married life.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Irandam Ulagaporin
programme.desc: A lorry driver ends up in possession of an unexploded bomb that is being sought after by both the cops and pro-peace activists.

programme.title: Pournami Alaigal
programme.desc: Rajesh, a junior lawyer, marries Radha, the daughter of a famous lawyer. He feels ignored due to her closeness with her father and to get back at them, he takes up a high-profile murder case.

programme.title: Bhale Khilladi
programme.desc: An amnesiac scientist is in love with a woman who is unaware of his condition. Things take a turn when he has to convince her parents to agree to them getting married.

programme.title: Ezhumin
programme.desc: A group of children proficient in martial arts are kidnapped by thugs who have been sent to prevent them from taking part in an event. However, the children escape using their skills.

programme.title: En Peyar Surya En Veedu India
programme.desc: Following two violent incidents at a club and a police station, a short tempered soldier is challenged to give up anger if he wants to fulfill his dream of serving at the borders.

programme.title: Dhiya
programme.desc: When Thulasi gets pregnant before marriage, she is forced to abort the baby. Years later, her unborn baby's spirit kills all those who forced her mother to undergo an abortion.

programme.title: Marakatha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Mo
programme.desc: Three friends fool people into believing they are exorcists and take money from them under false pretences. But when they get hired to scare a business rival, they encounter a real spirit.

programme.title: Seeru
programme.desc: A guy from a small-town takes on a ruthless criminal lawyer for his friend and sister

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: A biopic on the late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister J Jayalalithaa.

programme.title: Podhuvaga En Manasu
programme.desc: A young man's dream to do good deeds for the upliftment of his village is interrupted by an influential man, who does not want anyone to grow above him.

programme.title: Kappal
programme.desc: Vasu and his friends take a vow to never marry to keep their friendship intact. However, when Vasu falls in love with Deepika, his friends decide to ruin his affair.

programme.title: Mandhira Punagai Ep66
programme.desc: Gayatri is all set to marry a young man named Kathir but things take a turn for the worst when someone from her past gets involved. They then get caught up in a series of unexpected events.

programme.title: Pachaikilli Ep94
programme.desc: Pachaikilli, a fun-loving and kind-hearted woman, has three beloved brothers. Circumstances make her get married to a disciplined lawyer.

programme.title: Valli Thirumanam Ep251

programme.title: Gabbar Is Back
programme.desc: The city's administration wrongs Aditya, a commoner. To avenge his tragedy, he disguises himself as a vigilante, Gabbar, and teams up with honest government officers to expose the corrupt.

programme.title: Department
programme.desc: Inspector Mahadev Bhosale recruits Shiv Narayan, a suspended brave police officer, to form a hit squad. Soon after Shiv joins the gangster-turned-minister Sarjerao Gaikwad, Mahadev and Shiv turn foes.

programme.title: Ungli
programme.desc: A street-smart policeman tries to catch a gang of social vigilantes who adopt unconventional means to unmask corrupt people. Soon, he himself becomes a member of the gang.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: One By Two
programme.desc: Amit struggles with a mundane life and a recent breakup, while Samara, an aspiring dancer, tries to win a reality show. After several accidental escapes, the strangers' paths finally cross.

programme.title: Lekar Hum Deewana Dil
programme.desc: Dino and Karishma get married in Goa and head to the lesser-known parts of the country, afraid of being caught by their parents. However, they start facing multiple challenges in their marital life.

programme.title: Aladin
programme.desc: A young orphan, Aladin, who gets bullied by his peers, finds a magic lamp that changes his life. Thereafter, he sets off on a series of adventures and uses the lamp to defeat the evil Ringmaster.

programme.title: Aladin
programme.desc: A young orphan, Aladin, who gets bullied by his peers, finds a magic lamp that changes his life. Thereafter, he sets off on a series of adventures and uses the lamp to defeat the evil Ringmaster.

programme.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
programme.desc: Dr Anmol, a dentist and henpecked husband, lives a miserable existence in New York due to his domineering wife. However, his troubles increase when he unwittingly gets embroiled in a mafia rivalry.

programme.title: Kunwara
programme.desc: Raju and Urmila meet in New Zealand and fall in love. However, when Raju helps a pregnant woman with a jilted lover, he ends up sabotaging his love life.

programme.title: R... Rajkumar
programme.desc: Romeo, a ruffian, starts working for Shivraj, a drug lord, and they end up falling for the same girl, Chanda. Soon, a fight between the two ensues to win her over.

programme.title: Mary Kom
programme.desc: When Mary Kom encounters a renowned coach in a boxing gym, she shares her boxing aspirations with him and convinces him to teach her. Despite her father's disapproval, she follows her passion.

programme.title: Aatank Ki Jung
programme.desc: Meenakshi wants Zareen to help her take action against an ad agency owner, Gowtham. However, due to a turn of events, Meenakshi and Gowtham get intel on a terrorist attack and have to stop it.

programme.title: Hey Ram
programme.desc: When his wife, Aparna, gets raped during the partition of India, Saketh Ram joins a gang that aims to kill Mahatma Gandhi because he advocates peace with Muslims.

programme.title: Real Winner
programme.desc: Frustrated with Shakti's rebellious nature, his parents send him to stay at his grandparents' house where he falls in love with Neelima. But he is shocked to learn that her marriage is already fixed.

programme.title: Saajan
programme.desc: Brothers Aman and Akash fall in love with Pooja. While both of them are willing to sacrifice their love for each other's sake, Pooja must make her decision.

programme.title: De Dana Dan
programme.desc: Two penniless friends are in desperate need of money in order to marry their respective girlfriends. In their attempts to make quick money, they kidnap a rich woman's pet and demand a hefty ransom.

programme.title: Chaahat
programme.desc: When Roop comes to the city for his father's medical treatment, he falls for Pooja and proposes to her. However, when a spoilt Reshma falls for him, she turns crazy and tries to own him.

programme.title: Chaahat
programme.desc: When Roop comes to the city for his father's medical treatment, he falls for Pooja and proposes to her. However, when a spoilt Reshma falls for him, she turns crazy and tries to own him.

programme.title: Kya Kehna
programme.desc: Priya falls in love with Rahul, a womaniser, who jilts her after she gets pregnant. However, when she is ostracised by everyone, Ajay, her best friend, supports and helps her.

programme.title: Phir Bhi Dil Hai Hindustani
programme.desc: Ajay Bakshi and Ria Banerji are two rival TV reporters and will stop at nothing to outdo each other. Finally, they team up to help a man seek justice for his daughter who was raped by a politician.

programme.title: Veeram The Power Man
programme.desc: Vinayagam lives with his four brothers and they often get into trouble with the law. When he falls in love with a girl named Koppu, he decides to mend his ways for her.

programme.title: Manik Baasha
programme.desc: Rickshaw driver Manickam is a man who avoids violence at all costs. However, when his brother, a cop, gets into trouble with some goons, it triggers a set of events that revive Manickam's old self.

programme.title: Chintu Ji
programme.desc: Rishi, the son of a legendary actor, decides to enter politics and go to Hadbahedi, a remote village. However, he creates havoc by misleading the villagers who trust him simply because he is famous.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Aa Dekhen Zara
programme.desc: Photographer Ray Acharya, who has not seen much of success considering his potential, inherits a magical camera from his grandfather that transforms his life completely.

programme.title: Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-Leela
programme.desc: Ram and Leela love each other but cannot stay together as their families, Rajadi and Sanera, have been at war with each other for the past 500 years. In the end, they both need to make a sacrifice.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: To rescue his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and battle an old enemy . . . and rediscover the child in himself.

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: The personal assistant and Cinderella sister of a spoiled movie star finds herself in the middle of a behind the scenes Hollywood soap opera.

programme.title: Ocean's 11
programme.desc: Eleven pals prepare to carry out a theoretically foolproof plan to rob five Las Vegas casinos at midnight on New Year's Eve. The plan depends on split-second timing, and everything goes like clockwork at first. But even in this almost perfect scheme, things begin to go wrong.

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
programme.desc: They're back! The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: The world's richest and most lovable drunk risks everything when he falls in love with an irascible waitress in the hilarious comedy starring Dudley Moore and Academy Award-winner Liza Minnelli.

programme.title: Ocean's 11

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: The world's richest and most lovable drunk risks everything when he falls in love with an irascible waitress in the hilarious comedy starring Dudley Moore and Academy Award-winner Liza Minnelli.

programme.title: Gone With The Wind
programme.desc: On the eve of the United States Civil War, rich, beautiful and self-centered Scarlett O'Hara (Leigh) has everything she could want—except Ashley Wilkes (Leslie Howard). But as the war devastates the South, Scarlett discovers the strength within herself to protect her family and rebuild her life. Through everything, she longs for Ashley, unaware that she is already married to the man she really loves (Gable)—and who truly loves her—until she finally drives him away. Only then does Scarlett realize what she has lost … and decide to win him back.

programme.desc: On the eve of the United States Civil War, rich, beautiful and self-centered Scarlett O'Hara (Leigh) has everything she could want—except Ashley Wilkes (Leslie Howard). But as the war devastates the South, Scarlett discovers the strength within herself to protect her family and rebuild her life. Through everything, she longs for Ashley, unaware that she is already married to the man she really loves (Gable)—and who truly loves her—until she finally drives him away. Only then does Scarlett realize what she has lost … and decide to win him back.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Paul Brenner, a CID investigator with the power to arrest any military person -- whatever the rank -- anywhere in the world. He's been called in to investigate the murder of Captain Elisabeth Campbell, the daughter of a famous general. What he discovers beneath the well-ordered surface of military life is a sordid secret that makes murder suspects of some of the Army's finest. Based on Nelson DeMille's novel of the same name.

programme.desc: An important breeder has been assassinated. The case is complex as there are several possible suspects – the lovelorn girlfriend, the jealous ex-wife, the rugby player foe or the farmer he fell out with? The truth is buried deep beneath secrets and lies.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep11
programme.desc: Life Time - B.J. must battle both the clock and his conscience when a soldier may be permanently paralyzed unless he relieves an aortal replacement within twenty minutes and the only donor candidate is B.J.’s own patient, a soldier who has no brain function but is still hanging on. Although all of the medical staff agree with B.J. that his patient has no hope for recovery as the brain damage is permanent, the soldier’s best friend is also amongst the wounded and makes a plea for his friend that B.J. finds hard to ignore. Finally, the young G.I. understands that his friend is gone and his sacrifice will save the life of another man. For B.J. it is more than just another donor and he turns to his friends for support.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep12
programme.desc: Dear Uncle Abdul - Klinger’s new position as company clerk gives him new insight into the inner workings of the 4077th, and he makes several attempts to write to his Uncle Abdul back in Toledo while also trying to adjust to the demands of his new job. Klinger’s narration of a slice of life at the 4077th reveals the humor of camp life from Klinger’s perspective. Day-to-day 4077th humor topped off with the description of Hawkeye and B.J. competing to be the funniest man at M*A*S*H gives Klinger’s Uncle Abdul a letter worth waiting for.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep13
programme.desc: Captains Outrageous - Rosie is injured in a bar fight in her own bar and it is up to the doctors of the 4077th to keep the bar running in her absence. While Hawkeye and B.J. mix drinks, Col. Potter is faced with a more serious dilemma: Father Mulcahy is up for promotion again and fears that his request will again be denied and wants the Colonel to help him. Colonel Potter’s calls lead him all the way to the Pentagon, where he discovers the delay is due to a simple mix up.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep14
programme.desc: Stars and Stripe - B.J. and Winchester work together to save a soldier’s life during a perilous operation, but conflict occurs when they are asked to co-author a report on the surgery for a prestigious medical journal. While neither doctor wants to take all of the credit, both would like to claim most of it for themselves and a battle of wills ensues. Meanwhile, Hot Lips receives a visit from her combat soldier beau Scully, and is disappointed when she hears that he has been demoted for disobeying a superior officer. Charles and B.J. finally realize that their surgical success was due to their cooperative efforts and they finally work together to finish their report. Hot Lips discovers that when it comes to her feelings for Scully, rank is not an issue, and he in turn sees that she is more of a woman to him than a Major.

programme.desc: On a special birthday themed episode, Food Factory serves up birthday cake ice cream, edible waffle bowls, mountains of cotton candy, and a giant chocolate piñata.

programme.title: Dynasties S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Meerkats - A young meerkat queen must unite her family if her pups are to survive in a harsh land.

programme.title: Mediterranean with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Simon Reeve embarks on the first leg of an extraordinary four-part journey around the Mediterranean, travelling from Malta across the sea to southern Italy and on to Albania.

programme.title: Universe S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Black Holes: Heart of Darkness - Professor Brian Cox journeys across the vastness of time and space.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Hippo Lagoon Ep1
programme.desc: Secluded and sheltered, away from the hustle and bustle of Zambia’s Luangwa River, Kasikizi lagoon is home to a small community of diverse wildlife. At the height of the wet season, it’s full to the brim with water – a peaceful spot, ideal for two old male hippos who wallow in its watery depths. The lagoon is their sanctuary, a world away from the more violent life they’ve left behind at the main river, where they had to face aggressive beachmasters, willing to fight to protect their territory...

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Coming of the Rains Ep3
programme.desc: The rains are late. It is the most brutal time of year. Babies born into drought face starvation. Everything is desperate for rain. When it arrives, it is a downpour on an enormous scale. Alien creatures emerge into a different world. The wet season begins.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europe’s birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Flying Fox Ep4
programme.desc: Flying out of the Australian twilight is one of the most successful mammals on the planet – the bat – and one of the most gregarious of their kind is the flying fox. With a wingspan of more than a meter, the grey headed flying fox is the largest fruit eating bat in the country.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of Mini Marsupials Ep5
programme.desc: While all marsupials share similarities, it is some of the rare smaller marsupials that highlight the fascinating contrast between them - and few small marsupials highlight these innate differences better than the quokkas and the quolls.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Ugly Ep3
programme.desc: Gawk at some of the world’s ugliest animals who owe their survival to the adaptations that made them so strange. A pudgy wolf eel, naked mole rat, and hideous sea lamprey may be superficially grotesque, but they’re evolutionarily amazing.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - The Berenty Dynasty Ep5
programme.desc: The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - The Wild Web Ep7
programme.desc: In Zambia, no single creature survives in isolation. From lions and leopards to jumping spiders and bee-eating mantises, study the diverse network of animals and plants that makes the Luangwa Valley one of the most magical wildernesses in Africa.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Hippo Lagoon Ep1

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Flying Fox Ep4
programme.desc: Flying out of the Australian twilight is one of the most successful mammals on the planet – the bat – and one of the most gregarious of their kind is the flying fox. With a wingspan of more than a meter, the grey headed flying fox is the largest fruit eating bat in the country.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of Mini Marsupials Ep5
programme.desc: While all marsupials share similarities, it is some of the rare smaller marsupials that highlight the fascinating contrast between them - and few small marsupials highlight these innate differences better than the quokkas and the quolls.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - The Berenty Dynasty Ep5
programme.desc: The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Land of Extremes Ep1
programme.desc: This episode visually illustrates how the Arctic, locked in darkness for nearly seven months, springs to life once the sun rises above the horizon. We explore ideas of migration, hibernation, the food web and habitat change, and are introduced to some of the Arctic’s most magnificent and iconic creatures and its most dramatic landscapes.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Creepy Crawlers Ep4
programme.desc: Witness the tiny creatures that make us squirm while hiding admirable survival skills. From playing dead, removing a tail, or being able to lift objects 30 times their weight, these insects conquer the world with their amazing adaptations.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - The Wild Web Ep7
programme.desc: In Zambia, no single creature survives in isolation. From lions and leopards to jumping spiders and bee-eating mantises, study the diverse network of animals and plants that makes the Luangwa Valley one of the most magical wildernesses in Africa.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Hippo Lagoon Ep1
programme.desc: Secluded and sheltered, away from the hustle and bustle of Zambia’s Luangwa River, Kasikizi lagoon is home to a small community of diverse wildlife. At the height of the wet season, it’s full to the brim with water – a peaceful spot, ideal for two old male hippos who wallow in its watery depths. The lagoon is their sanctuary, a world away from the more violent life they’ve left behind at the main river, where they had to face aggressive beachmasters, willing to fight to protect their territory...

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Coming of the Rains Ep3
programme.desc: The rains are late. It is the most brutal time of year. Babies born into drought face starvation. Everything is desperate for rain. When it arrives, it is a downpour on an enormous scale. Alien creatures emerge into a different world. The wet season begins.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europe’s birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Flying Fox Ep4
programme.desc: Flying out of the Australian twilight is one of the most successful mammals on the planet – the bat – and one of the most gregarious of their kind is the flying fox. With a wingspan of more than a meter, the grey headed flying fox is the largest fruit eating bat in the country.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of Mini Marsupials Ep5
programme.desc: While all marsupials share similarities, it is some of the rare smaller marsupials that highlight the fascinating contrast between them - and few small marsupials highlight these innate differences better than the quokkas and the quolls.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Identity Crisis Ep5
programme.desc: Are they guinea pigs, beavers, or something else? Capybaras embody the features of several different animals at once, as do warthogs, anteaters, and other fascinating genetic hybrids. Learn why these wannabes display such particular physical traits.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Tricksters Ep6
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is filled with mimicry, transformation, and trickery. Discover how stick bugs, lion fish, emperor scorpions, and chameleons use camouflage and confusion to deceive.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - A Tale of Two Penguins Ep1
programme.desc: At the water’s edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. It’s time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Devon Island - Land of Ice Ep2
programme.desc: Devon Island is the largest uninhabited island in the world. It’s so remote and forbidding that when scientists wanted to simulate living conditions on Mars, they chose Devon. Devon’s barren landscape only supports the hardiest of plants and few animals.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earth’s axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Flying Fox Ep4
programme.desc: Flying out of the Australian twilight is one of the most successful mammals on the planet – the bat – and one of the most gregarious of their kind is the flying fox. With a wingspan of more than a meter, the grey headed flying fox is the largest fruit eating bat in the country.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of Mini Marsupials Ep5

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - From Cloud to Coast Ep5
programme.desc: Monsoon storms sweep over the tropical island of Sri Lanka, and water carried in with swirling mists hits the mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the many changing faces of the island’s forests.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - Life on the Wing Ep6
programme.desc: Yala National Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 species of bird. This paradise offers many possibilities for parents who can weather the ever-changing climate. Every species must either raise their offspring here or find a new home before the dry season ends and the monsoon storms begin.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Dino Ep7
programme.desc: T-Rex and chickens seem to be as different as they can be, but they more in common that you might think. Recent research reveals that some of our favorite dinosaurs were very birdlike, and that birds are an extant kind of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - Return of the African Titans Ep1
programme.desc: There are eight North African white rhinos left in the world and only four are of breeding age. With the clock ticking on their species, an international mission has been working for several years to move the four to Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Untamed West Ep2
programme.desc: New Zealand’s West Coast is like nowhere else on Earth. From glacier-covered mountains to rain-drenched native forests to rough frigid seas, the landscape defies belief. Isolated from the rest of the world, this strip of almost untouched wilderness hides a host of endemic animals. Evolutionary castaways, every one of them is a rare ecological jewel. From alpine parrots and shy penguins to mammal-like kiwis and ancient eels. To survive the conditions the wildlife here has to be hardy, cunning and resourceful. A journey along the West Coast reveals the beauty of this land, and the trials and tribulations of the wildlife that live here.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Delta Discoveries Ep3
programme.desc: The Western Arctic’s mammoth Mackenzie Delta is the second largest in North America after the Mississippi. Here we find strange and mysterious land forms above an immense underbelly of permafrost featuring a phenomenal diversity of microorganisms, and strange creatures that tell a story of an ever changing Arctic. This is the migratory destination - and summer home - to several million birds, fish, animals. .. and humans.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - From Cloud to Coast Ep5

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary’s orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla’s fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep1
programme.desc: Ty And Revvit - Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Big In Japan - Wally and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Get Rich Quick / Noogie Nights - Richie Rich visits Harvey Street to shut down a game gone rogue. Lessons learned at a murder mystery party help Richie make his first real friends.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chicken At Sea / The Key Master - Archibald hits the high seas to help out endangered turtles. It's Archibald to the rescue when the citizens of Crackridge report a series of thefts.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep27
programme.desc: Queen Of Police / Roidian Prom - When Tip takes over Kyle's job as "King of Police," she removes all rules from Boovsland and it descends into chaos; Tip and Oh accompany DieAnne to Roidian Prom

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter The Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep3
programme.desc: Clubbing - Homesick, Cleo tries joining some school clubs to feel better. Her homesickness has an unexpected and destructive effect.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep27
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 1 - Prince Barty and Princess Julienne, King Julien's needy and dramatic parents, must take over for their son when he's held captive on a pirate ship

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep1
programme.desc: The Perfect Show/ Napoleon - Peabody & Sherman's first show goes off the rails when celebrity-seeking neighbors won't leave; Napoleon throws a temper tantrum to get his own dessert.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep26
programme.desc: Tur-Bros / The Snailman - During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep1
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Rupert & The Scarecrow - Rupert and the others meet a sad little scarecrow who's lonely and upset that the crows don't come near him.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rupert & The Octopus’S Garden - Ping Pong's magic accidentally brings a picture of an Octopus to life and the friends need to stop it causing chaos.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep21
programme.desc: Jungle Jiggles - Raa Raa wants a partner to dance a noisy stompy dance with. All the animals have their own way of dancing, apart from Zebby who says she is too shy to dance… or is she?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep22
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Great Big Noise - Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy “moon”, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet'S Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep74
programme.desc: Pumpkin Pie For Diggly - Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep21
programme.desc: The Wrong Man-Ace - Dennis is mistaken for a Beanotown Baddie while in disguise to sneak into 12A film. At first Dennis loves being treated like a celebrity, but as things begin to go awry his friends have to save him by revealing his real identity and capturing the true diamond stealing baddie!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Red And Black To The Future - When Dennis comes across Professor Screwtop’s time machine in his lab, then uses it without reading the instructions he starts a chain of events that lead 2 Gnashersaurus Rex's rampaging through Beanotown! How is Dennis going to set things right without bumping into other versions of himself and destroying the space time continuum!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep37
programme.desc: The Voltron Show! - With the Galra empire in upheaval Team Voltron realizes that now is the time to unite the galaxy and bring the fight to Zarkon

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep11
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Two - After Bullwinkle drinks a monster serum, he can’t control when he turns into a big hairy monster, so he and Rocky go on the run from angry mobs and internet celebrities

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race—loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep2
programme.desc: Scrapadactyls - When Revvit and his Reptool friends venture out of their ravine, the Dinotrux band together to save them from a flock of savage Scrapadactyls.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep2

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep27
programme.desc: Queen Of Police / Roidian Prom - When Tip takes over Kyle's job as "King of Police," she removes all rules from Boovsland and it descends into chaos; Tip and Oh accompany DieAnne to Roidian Prom

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail - When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep29
programme.desc: Why Wildebeest Stampede - You see there was a time when Wildebeest didn't stampede. They used to stand on the plains and munch grass all day. But there were so many of them and they were eating so much grass that all the animals had to do something about it. Tortoise realized that the Wildebeest weren't the brightest animals in Tinga Tinga and they always did whatever the last beast said. So the animals decided to tell the Wildebeest that ‘they were welcome to stay in Tinga Tinga and they must never RUN!' So what did the Wildebeest do? They ran and they ran and they RAN! So that's Why Wildebeest Stampede! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep30
programme.desc: Why Chameleon Changes Colour - You see there was a time when Chameleon wasn't bright and colourful at all. In fact Chameleon was rather dull and grey… like a rainy day. One day when all the animals are playing games and sheltering from the rains Chameleon decides to slip away because he feels boring. Butterfly comes across Chameleon sitting sadly on a rock and shows him a rainbow. Chameleon can't resist and stands on the Rainbow, and TA-DAH!! He turns red and yellow and pink and green! Chameleon soaks up all the colours of the magical rainbow and now, KAPOW!! Chameleon can be any colour he wants! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Toyland Mischief Maker - When Big Ears' teapot goes missing, Noddy is surprised to find it hanging from a lamp post. And when Bumpy's kennel goes missing too, it's clear there's a mischief maker in Toyland. Noddy needs to investigate before Toyland descends into chaos. Using his investigating kit and with Revs and Bumpy to help, Noddy discovers that it was the Naughticorns playing a game of Dare and daring each other to do silly things. The Naughticorns apologise for creating mischief in Toyland and Noddy finds a way for everyone to play the dare game together – safely! Go, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Popping Balloons - Noddy and his friends are each given a balloon at the end of Smartysaurus's Science Party. But when lots of the balloons start going pop, Noddy decides to investigate why. Realising that someone must be hiding and popping them, he follows the clues to PatPat and then to the Naughticorns before eventually working out that the balloon poppers are the Ninjas. They've been playing their favourite game: Ninja-Balloon-Pop! Noddy helps them to see that while they were having fun, everyone else was getting upset. Back at the Dino-Lab, the Ninjas apologise and this time everyone happily joins in with a game of Ninja-Balloon-Pop. Case closed! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep29
programme.desc: How Can We Make The Most Beautiful Garden Ever? - Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants – and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep30
programme.desc: Why Are There Little Hills In The Orchard? - Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep2
programme.desc: Dungball Derby/Ace Of Race - When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. // Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Rupert & The Magic Show - When Ping Pong's glow-worm trick goes wrong, it's her rival Bill who ends up helping out… with spectacular results.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep23
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Nap Time Story - Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story. But they are all too loud and poor Zebby can't get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep24
programme.desc: Go Bananas - Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep75
programme.desc: Rockabye Stingo - Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!
