programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van – even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Holiday Parties! - In Holiday Land, there's a town for every holiday...that is, until Pirate Myra uses Wizard Grouper's magic wand to turn every town into Pirate Town! Will Molly and Gil be able to restore Holiday Land back to normal?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep508
programme.desc: The Gold Medal Games - It's time for the Gold Medal Games, and Blaze is ready to compete! But when Crusher cheats and sends his rival flying far away, Blaze has to speed back to Axle City to beat the buzzer and win that medal!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Stones of Power - When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitán Calavera!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep171
programme.desc: Bubu's New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep172
programme.desc: Everywhere at Once - Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep803
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rubble-Double / Pups Save a Clown - Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help. // The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: The Big Bug Hunt - Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Rainbow Comet Rush - Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler - Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Paddington and the Fingertrap - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep618
programme.desc: The Fastest of them All - When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Snow Rescue Blaze - When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue / The Compass Caper - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: William vs. Wild - After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep514
programme.desc: The Mighty, Untidy Titans! - When some Untidy Titans (played by Guppies) start messing up Zooli, Nonny, and Oona's goat farm, the goat herders must journey to the Titan's cloud realm to ask them to tidy up.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep516
programme.desc: It's a Lizard! - When showman Gil's "real live dragon" (actually a Komodo Dragon) gets loose in the small town of Bubbleville, it's up to Pet Finders Oona and Zooli to track the lizard down and return it to its home on Komodo Island.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep173
programme.desc: The Blue Butterfly - Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. The friends finally discover the best way to capture their enchanting photo.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep174
programme.desc: Achoo ! - Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Perfect Dinner - Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Pups Save a Dragon / Pups Save Three Little Pigs - A fantasy fire breathing dragon comes to life and won’t let Ryder and pups into the Lookout! Paw Patrol takes to the Air Patroller! // The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Pups Save a Stinky Flower / Pups Save a Monkey-Naut - Mayor Humdinger drops off a ‘gift’ to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms. // Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: The Big Bug Hunt - Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Paddington Finds A Pigeon / Paddington and Chores List - Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go? // The family all have chores except Paddington. So as not to be excluded, Mr. Brown creates a list for him to follow, but Paddington picks up the wrong list.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Winter Sports Chompetition! - Gil and Bubble Puppy are competing in the Winter Sports Chompetition--a competition for athletes and their dogs! Will they be able to stop reigning champs Coldsnap and his dog Mr. Husky from cheating to win the gold?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Great Space Race - Blaze and AJ take off into space for a race that's out of this world! Along the way to Planet Victory, they meet friendly aliens, dodge asteroids, and face off against Crusher's space ship!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceañera, part 1 / Finceañera, part 2 - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Present - Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep814
programme.desc: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep87
programme.desc: Lullaby - During Tiddlytubbies' Sleepybyes, RuRu is wide awake. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po take it in turns to sing him a lullaby.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep12
programme.desc: Socks - Dee encourages a friend to say 'socks' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different socks - summer socks, cosy socks, toes-y socks and even super socks!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: A Little Night Reading - When one Twin Po wants their bedroom to be bright and the other Twin Po likes it dark, Team Tinpo needs to find a way for them to not see the light.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: It's Time to Press a Flower - JoJo and Gran Gran press a flower so that it will last for a long time. JoJo learns that flowers wilt over time but flower pressing is a special way to make them last longer.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep74
programme.desc: Purple Zappa - Monty gets a new toy robot and wonders whether it is better to keep it shiny and clean in the box or to have fun playing with it.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep73
programme.desc: Monty Rides Again - Monty is nervous about trying skateboarding and begins wondering why some people just seem to have courage and others don't.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: Wagon Ride - Bluey can't wait to get to the monkey bars as Dad takes her and Bingo on a wagon ride to the park. But her patience is tested when Dad keeps stopping to chat with other grown-ups.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep1
programme.desc: Norrie's First Day - Norrie skips into the Clubhouse and greets her friends. As they greet her, they reminisce about when they first met.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep52
programme.desc: The Walking Badge - The Squirrels learn the many ways you can walk with the help of friends and a catchy song.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep51
programme.desc: The Action Hero Badge - The Squirrels learn about an action hero called Jet Rocket who always saves the day by smashing and crashing things. But there are other ways to save the day!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep33
programme.desc: The Sphinx, Egypt - Glitch and the Grimbots are on holiday in Egypt where the Grimbots bury the Great Sphinx in sand, leaving only its head showing.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep32
programme.desc: Everglades National Park, Florida - The Go Jetters save the Florida Everglades when hungry alligators chase Glitch's picnic.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: Shops - Playing 'Shops' is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing who's who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: The Pool - Packing for the pool, Bluey and Dad tease Mum about being so fussy with what to take. But when they arrive underprepared, they realise a little planning goes a long way.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Andy and the Lions - Andy heads to Africa to meet a pride of lions and an agama lizard which eats flies.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Emergency Machines - Grace shows off three amazing machines that are all used in emergencies! Grace rides a police motorbike, shows off a rescue submarine and drives a mountain rescue 4X4 vehicle.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Captain - The Musical - In this episode Captain Captain has just finished writing her musical theatre masterpiece called Captain Captain - The Musical! Written by and starring herself! She has even written small parts for Sandy and Seaweed!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep50
programme.desc: The What Happened Badge - The Squirrels try and tell us what has just happened but are struggling to retell the story correctly.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep49
programme.desc: The Building Block Badge - The Squirrels become architects so they can design, build and bring to life their very own clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep48
programme.desc: The Reunion Badge - Duggee hosts a reunion for the first ever Squirrels he looked after. But the first ever Squirrels are older now and very similar to the Squirrels' parents. Does that mean that when the Squirrels are bigger, they will become like their parents, too?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep31
programme.desc: Timgad Ruins, Algeria - The Go Jetters visit Timgad in Algeria, but someone is playing games with their click-ons.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep30
programme.desc: The Boreal Forest, Canada - Glitch travels to Ontario to find a new teddy bear, but things start to go very wrong...

programme.desc: James to the Rescue - It is James' turn to be Sodor's rescue engine. At the Search and Rescue Centre, he eagerly awaits his 'call to action'.

programme.desc: Umbrella Bubbles - After getting muddy, Umbrella has to brave his fear of getting wet and take his first bath!

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S1) Ep5

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep41

programme.desc: The Thing That Sounded Lovely - The Dinopaws discover all the exciting sounds the world makes, and make some of their own.

programme.title: Doctor'S Insight

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rodriguez vs. Lemos
programme.desc: Main Event - Strawweights intent on making their case for a world title shot in 2023 collide at the APEX in Las Vegas, as Top Five contender Marina Rodriguez battles fellow Brazilian standout Amanda Lemos in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in her last five, Rodriguez’ bonus-winning victories over Amanda Ribas and Mackenzie Dern have made her a fan favorite heading into her showdown with Lemos, who is coming off a Performance of the Night submission win over Michelle Waterson in July. Plus, top-flight welterweights square off in the co-main event, with Neil Magny taking on Daniel Rodriguez.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep13
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep5
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
